name: Eternal Abyss
description:
Eternal Abyss is a take on shooters when you remove any notion of health, death and ammo. Weapons don't do damage, they only push enemies.

GOAL

Your goal is to keep the enemies (red) from your Pylons (blue). You can recharge your Pylons by standing close to them. Any Pylon reaching max charge will end the game (bad).

CONTROLS

WASD: Movement  // Left-Mouse: Shotgun // Right-Mouse: Rocket (Cool-Down) // Space: Double-Jump

ASSETS

All assets, music and code are original except for weapon icons by anbileru adaleru, Gregor Cresnar and Creaticca Creative Agency, all from The Noun Project.

CREATORS

Roman Ebneter // Lucas Eicher // Daniel Singer
